Bellevue.Madrona Heights, Bainbridge Island, Wash: Madrona Heights is a community of Bainbridge Island, Washington. It is located on the northwest part of the island, between the communities of Seabold to the north and Manzanita. The intersection of NE Hidden Cove Road and Henderson Road NE/Manzanita Road NE serves as the centre of the Madrona Heights community.
